heisigStory: By combining the primitive and the kanji of the last two frames and reading the results, we get: by one's side . . . craft. Conveniently, the left has traditionally been considered the "sinister" side, where dark and occult crafts are cultivated. Note how the second stroke droops over to the left and is longer than the first.
koohiiStory1: The LEFT side of my brain posesses the faculties needed for logical crafts, like engineering.
koohiiStory2: The left side of my brain, is for crafts.
words: left and right, influence, control, domination
